{%trans "Optional"%} 3500

["male", "female"]

["single", "married"]
{%trans "Optional"%} ["single"]

array {%trans "Set the graduation status of the people who can answer the poll. You can set one or more items or leave it null."%}
["illiterate", "undergraduate", "graduate"]
{%trans "Optional"%} ["graduate"]
degree
array {%trans "Set the university or college degree status of the people who can answer the poll. You can set one or more items or leave it null."%}
["under_diploma", "diploma", "2_year_college", "bachelor", "master", "phd"]
{%trans "Optional"%} ["master"]
range
array {%trans "Set the age range of the people who can answer the poll. You can set one or more items or leave it null."%}
["-13", "diploma", "14-17", "18-24", "25-30", "31-44", "45-59", "60+"]
{%trans "Optional"%} ["18-24"]
employmentstatus
array {%trans "Set the job status of the people who can answer the poll. You can set one or more items or leave it null."%}
["employee", "unemployed", "retired"]
{%trans "Optional"%} ["unemployed"]
housestatus
array {%trans "Set the housing status of the people who can answer the poll. You can set one or more items or leave it null."%}
["owner", "tenant", "homeless"]
{%trans "Optional"%} ["tenant"]
